summary: This is an email chain from November 2019, where an individual claims to have evidence of two major corruption cover-ups: a Rikers Island bribe scheme involving inmate Gigi Jordan, her lawyer Alan Dershowitz, and union boss Norman Seabrook; and a cover-up by the Manhattan DA's office and Cardinal Timothy Dolan to protect a priest, Fr. Miqueli, from embezzlement and child abuse allegations. The writer alleges retaliation for attempting to expose these matters.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Named as the lead lawyer for Gigi Jordan. The writer alleges Dershowitz was involved in a Rikers Island bribe scheme to secure illegal privileges for Jordan and suggests this information could be used as leverage in the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Gigi Jordan
persons.context: A multi-millionaire inmate at Rikers Island from 2010-2015, convicted of killing her son. The writer alleges she ran a $20k/month bribe scheme at Rikers, with Norman Seabrook as the recipient, and that her lawyers, including Dershowitz, participated.

persons.name: Norman Seabrook
persons.context: Former head of the Correction Officers' Benevolent Association. The writer alleges he was on the receiving end of a bribe scheme from Gigi Jordan, separate from the one he was prosecuted for, and that this was covered up.

persons.name: Cardinal Timothy Dolan
persons.context: Alleged to have ordered a cover-up to protect Fr. Miqueli from embezzlement and child abuse allegations. Also accused of orchestrating retaliation against the writer through NYPD and the Manhattan DA's office.

persons.name: Fr. Miqueli
persons.context: A New York priest accused of embezzling a million dollars from a Roosevelt Island parish and child sex abuse. The writer alleges Cardinal Dolan and the Manhattan DA's office colluded to cover up his crimes.

persons.name: Ron Kuby
persons.context: Mentioned as another lawyer on Gigi Jordan's defense team, pictured with Dershowitz at her trial.

persons.name: Cyrus Vance Jr.
persons.context: Referred to indirectly as the Manhattan DA whose office is accused of covering up the Gigi Jordan bribe scheme and the Fr. Miqueli allegations, and of maliciously prosecuting the writer.

connections.description: Dershowitz was the lead defense attorney for Gigi Jordan during her criminal case.
Alleged bribe relationship where Jordan paid Seabrook $20k/month for special favors and protection at Rikers Island.
Alleged to have been jointly involved in the Rikers bribe scheme, with Dershowitz's team bribing corrections officers to gain illegal access to Jordan.
Alleged that Cardinal Dolan ordered a cover-up to protect Fr. Miqueli from investigations into embezzlement and child abuse.
Alleged collusion between the Manhattan DA's office and Cardinal Dolan to cover up crimes and retaliate against the writer.
Mentioned in context of Dershowitz having been Epstein's lawyer, with the writer suggesting leverage from the Jordan case could force Dershowitz to flip on Epstein's accomplices.

events.title: Epstein Sex Offender Hearing
events.description: A court hearing where Alan Dershowitz, as Epstein's lawyer, successfully argued to have Epstein's sex offender status downgraded to Level 1.

events.title: Gigi Jordan Rikers Bribe Scheme
events.description: Alleged ongoing bribery scheme at Rikers Island where inmate Gigi Jordan paid $20k/month for special favors, with Norman Seabrook as the recipient.

events.title: Writer's Arrest After Email Threat
events.description: The writer sent an email to a Manhattan ADA threatening to go to the NY Post with evidence of corruption. Twelve hours later, NYPD arrested the writer at their home.

events.title: Norman Seabrook Sentencing
events.description: Sentencing hearing for Norman Seabrook on a separate bribery conviction. The writer attended and notes Seabrook was released on bail pending appeal.

events.title: Email to US Attorney's Office
events.description: The writer sends this email to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, offering evidence on the Gigi Jordan/Seabrook bribe scheme and the Dolan/Miqueli cover-up, and suggesting it relates to the ongoing Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: The writer claims to have evidence of a second, unreported Rikers Island bribe scheme involving inmate Gigi Jordan, her lawyer Alan Dershowitz, and union boss Norman Seabrook, which was covered up by the Manhattan DA's office.
The writer alleges a cover-up by Cardinal Timothy Dolan and the Manhattan DA's office to protect Fr. Miqueli from million-dollar embezzlement and child abuse allegations.

The writer states they were arrested by NYPD 12 hours after emailing a Manhattan ADA in May 2015 about their intent to expose this corruption, and were maliciously prosecuted for 2.5 years before a judge dismissed the case.

The writer suggests evidence of criminal activity by Alan Dershowitz in the Jordan bribe scheme could give the US Attorney's Office leverage to force him to cooperate in the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's accomplices.
The document is an attempt to provide information to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, linking local New York corruption allegations to the broader Epstein case.
